snippet.title: RPG Liege Dragon - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Find the Dragon Tools of the Heroes to stand up to the Evil Dragon in this turn-based fantasy RPG!

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.lostdragon&hl=en
App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1475435985

The Revived Evil Dragon...
A princess whose father has been killed, and who now must lead the kingdom...
A young man who has collapsed on a mountain, his memory completely lost...
In order to stand up to the menace of the Evil Dragon, the young man and the princess set off on an adventure, in search of the Dragon Tools of the Three Heroes.

Features
- Destroy hordes of enemies!
- Use Sorcery Stones to learn skills!
- Challenge powerful enemies!
- Upgrade weapons by applying special effects!
- Complete the monster guide to gain items!
- Trust affects the ending― Discover by meeting special conditions!

© 2011-2020 EXE-CREATE published by KEMCO
